note.p: Death: Aldersbrook, Little Ilford, Essex (27 August 1760)
Education: Trinity College, Oxford; MA (1723); Incorporated at Cambridge (1726)
Career: Formed collections and made drawings of antiquities and English fossils; travelled to Italy; built a small 'hermitage' at Aldersbrook for his collections
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Foster; Le Neve
References: Obituary, Gentleman's Magazine (1760), p394, 443 (Account of Lethieullier's life by Peter Collinson FRS);Obituary, London Magazine (1760), p556
